Welcome!

Welcome to the website of Chris Singer!

I am a recent Dev Bootcamp graduate who is just beginning their journey into the world of professional software engineering. I'll be starting work soon at 2Checkout in Columbus, Ohio, and I couldn't be more excited to really flex my new developer muscles. Poke around the site to learn more!

Questions? Comments? Critiques? Just contact me!
